# Notes for build

  * don't run `devtools::build_vignettes`
  * use full path descriptions rather than relative paths in vignettes, e.g, `paste0(getwd(),"/img2")` not `"img2"`

# Notes for testing

  * use Rhub for suggested test OS: [see this](https://blog.r-hub.io/2019/03/26/why-care/)
